object.name: jqxgrid_page
object.property: Provides a grid view of remote data.

<model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="prologue" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Displays before grid.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Prologue</title> </field> <field name="data_source" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>URL of the data source.</description> <title>Data Source</title> </field> <field name="data_type" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>Type of the data supplied by the source. Note that data from other servers may only be JSONP.</description> <title>Data Type</title> <default>XML</default> <values> <element>JSON</element> <element>JSONP</element> <element>XML</element> <element>CSV</element> <element>Tab</element> </values> </field> <field name="data_definition" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Description of the incoming data.</description> <title>Data Definition</title> </field> <field name="data_root" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Root tag for XML data.</description> <title>XML Root</title> <required>False</required> </field> <field name="data_record" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Record tag for XML data.</description> <title>XML Record</title> <required>False</required> </field> <field name="column_definition" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>Description of the columns to show on the grid.</description> <title>Column Definition</title> </field> <field name="display_options" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description>Optional features for the displayed grid.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Display Options</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Sortable columns</element> <element>Filterable columns</element> <element>Paged</element> <element>Exportable</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="epilogue" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Displays after grid.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Epilogue</title> </field> </schema> </model>
